remoteContent:
Remote Support gives our tech team the ability to remotely login the camera and identify potential malfunctions.This feature requires an Internet connection, please make sure the camera is connected to local Wi-Fi.

Tip: Remote Support will be turned off automatically when camera restart
logsPromptContent: Are you sure you want to download log file?

RightToLeft: Slicing from right to left, or from bottom to top in chronological order
